::Shadow Wing/Spears::

Shadow Wing::
She walked out of the ship and saw Spears sitting at the entrance 
looking like she was deep in thought. "Hey, you OK?"

Spears::
She turned with a little suprize. She relaxed and smiled,"Geez, you 
startled me."  She chuckled, "yeah, I'm fine."

Shadow Wing::
"OK, so what's on your mind? You looked like you were taking a trip 
back to Cybertron." She said with half a chuckle.

Spears::
"yeah, but not in this pile of rusted bolts. This ship is so damaged, 
it wouldn'tfly again even if we replaced everything onboard down to 
the paper clips in the captain's desk. The ark is grounded for good. 
And all we can do is sit here and repair parts of it just enough to 
survive another pred attack." She gave a deep sigh.

Shadow Wing::
She put a comforting hand on Spears shoulder.  "Don't worry, 
everything will work out.  You'll see." She smiled at Spears and 
walked down the ramp.  She had another welding torch with her.  She 
walked up to Lunarpine, "Hello beloved."
